payment_delete.title: Delete payment method
payment_delete.description_without_replacement: This payment method will no longer be available for future purchases.
payment_delete.description_with_replacement: If you delete this payment method, this will affect pre-authorized payments. You have the option to replace it with another payment method to continue receiving orders.
payment_delete.replace_method_with_new_method_descripti: Your {{currentPaymentMethodName}} will be deleted and replaced with {{newPaymentMethodName}} replaced with
payment_delete.error_when_deleting: We're sorry, something went wrong and we couldn't delete this payment method. Please try again later or refresh the page.

warning_message_with_replacement.with_pending_orders_and_subscriptions: Deleting this payment method will affect pre-authorized payments. If you do not select an alternative payment method, this payment method will continue to be charged for outstanding amounts for existing orders. By selecting an alternative payment method, you can continue to receive subscription orders without interruption.
warning_message_with_replacement.with_pending_orders: If you delete this payment method, it will be removed from your account and will no longer be available for future purchases. If you do not select an alternative payment method, this payment method will continue to be charged for outstanding amounts for existing orders.
warning_message_with_replacement.with_subscriptions: If you delete this payment method, this will affect pre-authorized payments. Replace it with an alternative payment method to continue receiving orders.

warning_message_without_replacement.with_pending_orders_and_subscriptions: Deleting this payment method will affect pre-authorized payments. This payment method will still be charged for outstanding amounts for existing orders, but you will no longer receive subscription orders. Add an alternative payment method to continue receiving subscription orders.
warning_message_without_replacement.with_pending_orders: If you delete this payment method, it will be removed from your account and will no longer be available for future purchases. It will still be charged for outstanding amounts for existing orders.
warning_message_without_replacement.with_subscriptions: Deleting this payment method will affect pre-authorized payments. Add an alternative payment method to continue receiving orders.

tooltip.card_verification_value_explanation: A 3-digit security code that is usually located on the back of your card. American Express cards have a 4-digit code on the front.
tooltip.card_security_notice: All transactions are secure and encrypted.

field_errors.credit_card_name_invalid: Enter your name exactly as it appears on your card
field_errors.credit_card_expiry_invalid: Enter a valid card expiration date
field_errors.credit_card_verification_value_blank: Enter the CVV or security code on your card

billing_address.title: Billing address
billing_address.choose_billing_address_from_list_button_: Select a billing address from the list

payment_methods.card_update_consent: This payment method will be saved for future purchases.

errors.generic: There was a problem with Google Pay. Try again or use a different payment method.
errors.missing_billing_address: Google Pay requires a billing address. Please add one to your account.

errors.generic: There was a problem with Apple Pay. Try again or use a different payment method.
errors.not_available: Apple Pay is not available on this device.
errors.missing_billing_address: Apple Pay requires a billing address. Please add one to your account.

payment_methods.add_payment_method_banner: Add payment method for faster checkout or pre-authorized services
payment_methods.expiration_warning_button_accessibility_: Expiry warning for {{paymentMethodName}} with the last digits {{lastDigits}} display

details_modal.title: Expiring store credit
details_modal.expirable_balance_info: Part of your credit expires on a date in the future
details_modal.expirable_amounts_info: Amounts that expire earlier will be applied first at checkout

customer_accounts.enable_javascript: To view your account, activate JavaScript in your browser settings or log in via another browser.

log_out_everywhere.title: Log out everywhere
log_out_everywhere.description: If you have lost your device and are concerned about security, log out everywhere to ensure the security of your account.
log_out_everywhere.warning_message: You will also be logged out on this device.

extension.move_down: Move extension to the next position

editor.link_new_tab_confirmation: This link cannot be opened in the editor. It will be opened in a new window ({{resolved_to_link}}). Click on "OK" to continue.

wishlist.empty_page: Your wishlist is empty, please add some item and refresh the page.
